wordGroup: absorption refrigerator 吸收式冷冻机；吸收式冰箱
cryogenic refrigerator 低温致冷器，低温冰箱

sentences.en: He foraged in the refrigerator for munchies.
His refrigerator frequently looked half empty.
sentences.cn: 他的冰箱经常看上去有点儿空。

sentences.en: My parents can't even afford a new refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 我父母甚至买不起一台新冰箱。
